title: Ranked Games
body: Hi guys i was promoted to silver 5 after being on bronze 1 and i got 2 free wins for the promos won the game and got promoted to silver 5, then i made a game won it but made another and lost it.I know that the preotection is off when u make a win at 0lp but if i loose my 3rd match will i get demoted or still stay at silver 5?

replies.body: Dropping from silver 5 to bronze 1 seems pretty difficult you would have to be on a big loss streak
Thanks guys for answering i was afraid to do any ranked matches till now
Your mmr needs to drop to like bronze 5, so if you go on a mass winstreak then yeah you will (let us say losing 10 in a row at 0 lp, then you'll drop)
